bibl.title: The Thomas Panel.
bibl.note: The Thomas panel (church mosaic: Corning Museum of Glass, Acc. Nr. 86.1.1) found in the Faiyoum and the opus sectile panels from Kenchreai (Corinth) were probably made in the same place in Egypt. The panels are roughly contemporaneous (IVth-Vth cent. A.D.).
bibl.seg: Brill Robert H. and David Whitehouse, The Thomas Panel.

The Thomas panel (church mosaic: Corning Museum of Glass, Acc. Nr. 86.1.1) found in the Faiyoum and the opus sectile panels from Kenchreai (Corinth) were probably made in the same place in Egypt. The panels are roughly contemporaneous (IVth-Vth cent. A.D.).
